_description: Send messages and read channels via Slack API
_workway: Enables communication without context-switching to browser
_setup: 1. Create a Slack App at https://api.slack.com/apps
2. Add Bot Token Scopes: channels:read, chat:write, users:read
3. Install to workspace and copy Bot User OAuth Token
4. Set SLACK_BOT_TOKEN and SLACK_TEAM_ID in environment
_usage: Read channel: 'What are the recent messages in #engineering?'
Find user: 'Who is online in the team?'
